title: Bitcoin
summary: Bitcoin is the first decentralized cryptocurrency, invented in 2008 by an unknown entity using the pseudonym Satoshi Nakamoto. Based on a free-market ideology, bitcoin began use as a currency in 2009 with an open-source implementation. From 2021-2025, El Salvador adopted it as legal tender. As a pseudonymous currency, its use by criminals has attracted regulatory attention, leading to bans in several countries.

factual.claim: Bitcoin was created in 2008 by Satoshi Nakamoto
One bitcoin is divisible to eight decimal places
As of June 2023, bitcoin had an estimated 81.7 million users

interpretive.statement: Economists describe bitcoin as potentially an 'economic bubble'
Bitcoin functions more as a payment system than a currency
Use by criminals has attracted regulatory attention
